about_the_game:
Create magical forests with cute faeries and wonderful gardens, now you can create an enchanting memory all on your own. Includes all you need to make magical fairy towns, both inside and outside!

Features:

* Includes all you need to make forests, fairy towns, and cute buildings
* Animated water tile for a nice pond, lake or ocean
* 29 graphic sheets and 1 sheet giving you tricks on mapping
* Fairy inspired architecture, includes all you need to make forests, fairy towns, and cute buildings.
* Some of the tiles come in the dark-lined and / or shadowed versions!
* Tile A2 / A4 tiles for floor, ground and wall
* Tile B / C / D / E includes: fairy houses, nature, fountain, graves, sanctuary (pillars, statue, vines, etc.), furniture (shelfs, tables, chairs, beds, fireplaces etc…) and more!
* Unique style not found anywhere else
* Easy to use and optimized for RPG Maker MV
* Bonus! Giant Fairy Tree character with talking animations!
* Bonus! Modern city tiles FREE!

Music

4 original songs by composers from England, the "Forest Elves"
2 original songs by "PhoenixUp"
Formatted in OGG and M4A for various RPG Maker softwares
